Summary: Not only is it the teaching facility for Harvard Medical school, but the entire hospital is run with a smoothness and efficiency that is impressive, while at the same time providing outstanding patient care.SPLITGreat staff, great nurses, great place.SPLITThe nurses, doctors, anyone who crossed our paths were great, courteous, smiling and helpful.SPLITI spend 15 hours total in the ER and again they had no idea what was wrong with me... took more blood, poked me more, made me sit next to severe drug addicts for hours...dangerous people screaming in the ER.SPLITfire his ass, his bad attitude and the rest of him.SPLITAwful awful awfulSPLIT2232

I'm truly grateful to those dear people go took such excellent care of me with kindness and dignity.SPLITThe attention from the staff and the amenities made me feel so well taken care of and happy that my baby was receiving all the best attention possible.SPLITThe people were SUPER nice and efficient and friendly, everyone from the doctors to the nurses to the people at registration.SPLITWhile they were taking my medical history, they said 'we understand from your notes that your Mother died of cancer, we're so sorry.'SPLITLies lies lies.SPLITNasty, hostile intake experience.SPLIT1842

The nurses were all really great and funny, not to mention knowledgeable about caring for newborns without undermining my instincts.SPLITOn the one hand, I'm grateful that we have huge, impressive, modern, state-of-the-art medical/teaching facilities.SPLITThey are competent, caring, thorough, intelligent, patient and empathetic.SPLITThey received wrong information from the hospital telling me lies about billing my insurance (my insurance STILL hasn't received a bill from them) and after proving them wrong the manager Tracy Blake still put the blame on me.SPLITHe finally gets a bed and then all hell broke loose.SPLITThey had the wrong information about my insurance, and now two years later still fail to correct their mistakes after trying to correct them multiple times.SPLIT1772

Some nurses are better than others,  but thankfully mine were young, cute, and also really good at their jobs.SPLITwonderful hospital, the nurses are so caring and seem to genuinely love their jobs.SPLITThe surgery went well, the care before and after was excellent, nurses and PT very supportive.SPLITthey lost them mid way through -- off into someone else's file.SPLITUnlike diners, however, patients are typically nervous wrecks, anticipating sterile decor and ungodly smells in lieu of an appealing night out.SPLITSPLIT290

But for routine things, primary care, outpatient specialty care, OB care, surgical care - all great.SPLITL&D part of NWH is great in my eye, all the nurses are very well attentive, the doctors are wonderful.SPLITEvery one I met was friendly, courteous, caring and knowledgeable.SPLITI am very disappointed with the way this hospital operates - partners should be ashamed of themselves for charging way too much for things, for having the lost confusing bill system ever.SPLITA couple of days ago, I went to the emergency room after severe heart pain, and a near-fainting episode.SPLITWe were very disappointed to receive a costly bill, after insurance covered only part of the many lab tests the hospital charged.SPLIT1298
